document_data.name: Lion Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Lion Street''' was a small road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Lion Street was located in the northeastern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]]. The road connected the southern end of [[Horn Street]] with [[Saerdoun Street]].
document_data.Notable Locations: [[The Raging Lion (Waterdeep)|The Raging Lion]] [[inn]] was located on the southern side of Lion Street. A tavern called [[A Maiden's Tears]] sat on a small unnamed alley that branched off the southern side of Lion Street.
